content: sts pm p2 k3 to end of round place bor marker and doublecheck again that your hat stitches are not twisted on your needle pattern round k45 slip marker p2 k3 to end repeat pattern round until hat measures approx 2 hat body switch to gauge needle and knit every round until hat measures approx 8 from cast-on edge visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkelmertbeanie www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
